column1: My Family purchased this car after our 1988 Ford Taurus Station Wagon went out  We thought  well  since that was a good car  why don t we try this one  Our mechanic sold it to us  He had used it 5 months  Since that time  a muffler has come out  the transmission has gone out  the door quit working  the windows quit  and other technicalities  Our family has big  tall people  This car is not designed for Big  Tall people  It is for Little people  4 8 5 5  We are getting rid of it  DO NOT GET THIS CAR  WE HAVE SPENT LOTS OF MONEY ON REPAIRS AND YOU WILL TOO br br
